content.html:
OK - I did it.

I am on Mastodon, with the handle @fractals@mastodon.social - no change.

BUT

I just reset my micro.blog generated mastodon account, so the old name is deleted and reset to

@microblog@john.philpin.com - which will just be my MicroBlog posts that are at John.Philpin.com automatically syndicated.

I think the change in naming from johnphilpin@john.philpin.com to microblog@john.philpin.com makes things a little clearer.
content.value:

content.html:
I have never liked Cramer. Loud and Brash is just the start.

I also do not invest in stocks - BUT - were I to do that, I would start watching his recommendations a little more closely and do the exact opposite.

And gosh darn, wouldn‚Äôt you believe it üçã Inverse Cramer is a new ETF that allows anyone to do just that.

BTW, the click-through lists some interesting Cramer recommendations.
